content:
# The new furnace is currently processing, with 4 iron ore remaining in it and 9 coal left as fuel. The status indicates that it is working properly.

# My updated inventory now contains:
# - 5 coal
# - 5 iron ore
# - 5 stone
# - 1 iron plate
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Since the furnace is actively smelting iron ore into iron plates, I can wait for it to finish processing. 
# I will monitor the furnace to see how many iron plates it produces.

# I will wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to see if the smelting completes.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(new_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Check if at least 5 iron plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After the wait, I can extract the iron plates from the furnace.
crafted_plates = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, new_furnace.position, quantity=5)  # Extract all produced iron plates
print(f"Extracted Iron Plates from new furnace: {crafted_plates}")
print(f"Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the furnace status after extraction
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Confirm total iron plates in the inventory after extraction
